title: Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP)
description: Enterprise resource planning (ERP) is the integrated management of main business processes, often in real time and mediated by software and technology.
key-ideas: ERP provides a continuous, often real-time view of business processes
Track: cash / money, raw materials, production capacity, orders, payroll
ERP facilitates data flow between departments and disparate applications.
ERP provides a single, integrated system and common databses for storing and viewing department and application data and status.
Combine data from various departments through modules; modules share a common view or format regardless of data origin.
